nodes.text: Nym's Revenge was the title of an unauthorized painting of the pirate warlord Nym. It showed the angry looking Nym gripping a Rodian at his throat and lifting him up into the air with only one hand, while pointing his slugthrower carbine at him with the other hand.
It was later adopted by the Lok Revenants for morale purposes.
Nym's Revenge is a painting in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Players receive it as a reward during the Nym's Theme Park quest line and can use it to decorate their houses.
